title: Heart Shaped
description: Heart Shaped is an assortment of 10 short stories set in a variety of venues, from a public library to a corporate office and served with humor. Proof positive that love can begin or begin again anywhere. This fast, fun read is sure to satisfy commuters, story lovers, and fans of happy endings. This book is no longer available. See revised edition, Heart Shaped II https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/5....
author: Sheila M. Cronin
